poem:
Diplomacy in a New Light

In gilded halls  
where power, poise  
shuffle in tentative waltz,  
he finds voice—  
a figure insistent,  
spilling words  
like rivers to some  
unseen sea,  
where dreams  
unmoor from silence and  
history waits,  
a surreal dance  
to frame the peace  
that hovers unseen.
